### ExtraInfoProcess.Update method
</br>


#### Updates the extra information associated with the current state process.

```csharp
public void Update(string? extraInfo)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| extraInfo | The new extra information to associate with the state process. Can be null to clear the existing information. |
